Name: Change Location of ADSR Data

Scripts.Script:
D47A2: [16, "Part 1 (DEFAULT: 0058)", hex]
D47AA: [16, "Part 2 (DEFAULT: B720)", hex]
D4806: [copy, D47A2, D47A4]
D480E: [copy, D47AA, D47AC]
D4822: [copy, D47A2, D47A4]
D4826: [copy, D47AA, D47AC]

//For XXXXXXXX, change the value to place you want the ADSR data to go
XXXXXXXX: [copy, 57B720, 593560]

Description:
Changes the ADSR location.
DEFAULT represents the address in ASM and therefore keeps the "negative rule" in mind
Real Default Location: 0057B720

Credit to Blake.
